description:
This tool was developed to assist in the design of in-place RF monitoring systems. This tool uses a brute force method to find the optimal location for RF receivers in a location of interest. This tool
currently depends on the commercial Wireless InSite software from Remcom. Currently available to US Government users only.
name: Deployment Optimization Tool (DOT)

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
